reviews.review_text: Came here on a Saturday night. The vibe is really cool, sports bar style. The food was absolutely delicious and the service quite good as well. Oh and they have decent prices. Honestly, I cant ask for more. See you next time folks! :)

My Husband and I have visited BC Kitchen the last 2 Saturdays in a row, during peak times and have received absolutely wonderful service! We attended last Saturday before a Canucks game and this Saturday before the Bryan Adams concert. Despite it being exceptionally busy, the front counter hostesses were smiling, calm and super inviting. The serving staff were very personable and we had multiple people check on us during our meal, including the Manger Albert (who is a Rockstar) and the restaurant Supervisor. The food was also great and served very fast! If youre looking for a place to go before or after an event nearby I would definitely recommend BC Kitchen. However, if its before and event I would also recommend reservations as its a popular spot. Thank-you again for the exceptional service during our last couple visits! We look forward to coming by again soon!

Went in after a Lions game and found the service to be great and quick which was surprising. Quality was good too. Also, with tickets, get a discount on your order on GameDay. That was a nice bonus. Typical bar good with a few unique dishes but the burger might be the sneaky best downtown Ive had. Great flavour. Well go back. Open early and late!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello BJ, Thank you so much for such a glowing and wonderful review - we pride ourselves on having fantastic service and even better food. We look forward to hosting you again. Regards, Albert Leung BC Kitchen | Assistant General Manager

reviews.review_text: Dont really understand the low ratings but this place is a hidden gem with one of the best happy hours and daily features.

I celebrated my birthday there.. staff is very good and they have a great choice of menu items. The best part is when chef gave us a free cake which made my birthday more memorable. Perfect place for a drink and food. Dinners are large portions and delicious. Service is friendly and good. Should make a reservation for weekends or party.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Virender, Thank you so much for your excellent review and for celebrating your special occasion at BC Kitchen. We are thrilled to hear that your dining experience was enjoyable and your birthday made memorable by the Kitchen team! On behalf of the BC Kitchen and Parq Vancouver family, we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future. Kind Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations Parq Vancouver

reviews.review_text: Great hidden place on the casino floor. 4 of us had their dine out menu...must say it was very delicious and with the price point it was a steal. Their tandoori cauliflower was uniquely amazing.. chowder awesomeness!! Mac and cheese was spot on. We shared their short rib, salmon. Everything was well flavoured  and presented . Definitely recommended!!
Love the prime rib. We got excellent service from Catherine Oh.

Nice place to share a meal with a friend before a concert. We had the dine-out menu which was a good deal. Enjoyed the simple but tasty dessert. Definitely worth the cheat.  My burger did arrive on the rare side but Nathan was very attentive and had it replaced PDQ.

The food was incredible and lets talk about the service! Carolina and Monica specifically were incredible, lots of choices for beer, drinks etc. the basketball game was not the best, but with good service! awesome experience. thank you for the great service.

Came here for Sunday Prime Rib Special.. Mine was cooked as to my liking, medium rare and tender. My server was very prompt and food was on the table quickly! I like the casual atmosphere. Would be back again.
Great time during last UFC. Albert Leung was great! Good food, good service, fun atmosphere.

Best tomato soup in town!  So many good dishes to choose my favorite ones,but I gotta say the fish taco,  tomato soup,  and their curry bowls are amazing !  Burger are delicious and filling!  If youre ever in the area ,make sure you check them out!

I live across the street from Parq and BC Kitchen has become our local hangout. The atmosphere is awesome and we have gone through literally every single item on the menu. Happy hour is great and while there were teething problems when it first opened, the service has been getting better and better. Love this place and just made reservations for this evening!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Kieran, Thank you for your fantastic review and your patronage at BC Kitchen. Were delighted to hear that you have had the opportunity to experience our menu and have enjoyed the many items BC Kitchen has to offer! On behalf of the BC Kitchen and Parq Vancouver family, we look forward to welcoming you back tonight! Kind Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations Specialist Parq Vancouver

reviews.review_text: I was there with my friend for celebrating they go back to their countries and It was a really good experience. The food is really good, the drinks were amazing, and the staff was really good, specially our waiter, his name is Burak, he help us a lot and he was really kind with us. For sure I am going back soon.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Rafael, Thank you so much for your excellent review and your patronage at BC Kitchen. We are so happy to hear that the food and service was excellent. We will be sure to share your valuable feedback with Burak and the team. We look forward to welcoming you back to BC Kitchen and Parq Vancouver soon. Kind Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations

reviews.review_text: Sure, Parq is great, but this restaurant/sports bar is a cut above.  The service is outstanding, their happy hour is insane, and their food is amazing. Their prime rib Sundays is to die for! So worth it.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Rob, Thank you so much for your excellent review and your patronage at BC Kitchen. We are happy to know that you enjoyed our happy hour, prime rib Sundays and the service offered by our team! We look forward to welcoming you back to BC Kitchen and Parq Vancouver in the near future. Kind Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations Parq Vancouver

reviews.review_text: Came here to watch a few NFL games and found it very enjoyable. Beers were tasty, small plates very good, great service. Overall very nice!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Heather, Thank you so much for your excellent review and your patronage at BC Kitchen. We are thrilled to hear that we hit the mark for you service-wise, and that you enjoyed the beers and small plates! We look forward to welcoming you back to BC Kitchen and Parq Vancouver in the near future. Kind Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations

reviews.review_text: Menu selection was terrific; with 4 people you do some sharing. The mushroom pizza was excellent. The service was very very good this evening.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Richard, Thank you so much for your review and your patronage at BC Kitchen. We are happy to know you enjoyed the menu selection and the mushroom pizza. We agree, it is great for sharing! We look forward to welcoming you back to BC Kitchen and Parq Vancouver soon. Best Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations

reviews.review_text: Good customer service every time Ive been here, lots of gluten-free options, good drinks, and atmosphere; too bad they close at 11pm considering its located in the casino.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear PK, Thank you for your fantastic review and patronage at BC Kitchen. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the food and atmosphere. We look forward to welcoming you back to BC Kitchen and Parq Vancouver again soon. Warmest Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations Specialist Parq Vancouver

reviews.review_text: Good drink selection and shared plates. Great place to gather the friends for a drink and snack before and after the game.
Star waitress,  bartender  Rita
Food is amazing, pakoras were to die for . Love the atmosphere. For sure will be returning.
So far bc kitchen is one of the best places to eat Western food and price is fair.
Waitress was polite and friendly  during the Super Bowl.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Jimmy, Thank you for your excellent review and your patronage at BC Kitchen. We are delighted to know that you enjoyed your visit during the Super Bowl. We hope to welcome you back to BC Kitchen and Parq Vancouver soon! Best Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations

reviews.review_text: food was so great. good deal
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Chel, Thank you so much for your stellar review and rating of BC Kitchen! Glad to hear we hit the mark! Do come back and visit us again soon. Warm Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations

reviews.review_text: Great burgers and great service
Good specials
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Drew, Thank you so much for your excellent rating and your patronage at BC Kitchen. We are happy you have had the opportunity to try our specials! We hope to see you back soon. Best Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations

reviews.review_text: I had dinner here on the last day of my trip to Vancouver. It is an excellent place to have a couple of drinks with friends and share a few dishes. In addition, the service is excellent: that night we were served by Burak, who was watching over us all the time and his recommendations were very good, especially the poutine and the squid. If you read this: Thank you very much again Burak, you are very kind.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear guest, Thank you very much for your review and your patronage at BC Kitchen. We are pleased to hear that your experience was pleasant and that the service provided by Burak was exceptional. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to BC Kitchen and Parq Vancouver soon. Kind regards, Emily Davis Community Relations
reviews.review_translated_text: Cene aqui el ultimo dia de mi viaje a Vancouver. Es un lugar excelente para tomar un par de tragos con los amigos y compartir unos platos. Ademas el servicio es excelente: aquella noche nos atendio Burak, quien estuvo pendiente de nosotros todo el tiempo y sus recomendaciones fueron muy buenas, en especial el poutine y el calamar. Si lees esto: muchas gracias de nuevo Burak, eres muy amable.
reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: Querido invitado, Muchas gracias por tu evaluacion y tu patrocinio en BC Kitchen. Nos complace escuchar que su experiencia fue agradable y que el servicio prestado por Burak fue excepcional. Esperamos tener la oportunidad de darle la bienvenida de nuevo a BC Kitchen y Parq Vancouver pronto. Saludos cordiales, Emily Davis Community Relations

reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Meaghan, Thank you for your wonderful rating and your patronage at BC Kitchen. We hope to see you again in the near future. Kind Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations Parq Vancouver
Thank you, Sandy!

Dear Kharah, Thank you for your fantastic rating and interest in BC Kitchen. We are delighted that you enjoyed your dining experience! We look forward to welcoming you back to BC Kitchen and Parq Vancouver again soon. Best Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations Specialist Parq Vancouver

Dear Bianca, Thank you for your fantastic rating and your patronage at BC Kitchen. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon. Sincerely, Emily Davis Community Relations Specialist Parq Vancouver
Dear A K, Thank you for your excellent rating and your interest in BC Kitchen. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon. Best Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations Parq Vancouver

Dear Manpreet, Thank you for your five stars and your patronage at BC Kitchen. We are happy you had an enjoyable experience! We look forward to welcoming you back to BC Kitchen and Parq Vancouver in the near future. Best Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations Parq Vancouver

Dear Valued Guest, Thank you so much for your five star rating and your patronage at BC Kitchen. We appreciate your support and look forward to welcoming you back again soon. Best Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations Parq Vancouver
Thank you for your rating and your patronage at BC Kitchen, Rostyslav!

reviews.review_text: Nice customer service  love the service, although the food quantity also was good. Burger was hot and juicy. Pizza was tasty and hot and cheesy. Like the crispy cauliflower and even chicken pokora

Great little restaurant inside Parq casino. Menu is pretty decent with variety of options from steak to salads and burgers. Service is quick and clean. Feel free to play some Foosball while you wait for your food. Good drink menu as well. All in all, pretty good!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Sia, Thank you for your review and your patronage at BC Kitchen. We are happy to know that you had an enjoyable guest experience and that the food, service and design elements were liked! Come back and visit us again soon! Warmest Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations

reviews.review_text: Very friendly and attentive server. Good free popcorn :) We came back now a second time for the prime rib special which comes with one drink - very good We will be back! Food : 4/5 |

Like most, came here for the Sunday prime rib special - $15 if you have an Encore card.  Meat is done to the right rarity.  Side of mashed potatoes and veggies it comes with are great too.  Everything tasted great and portion size was generous.  Decor and atmosphere were nice but on the quiet side.  There s a bar section with TVs and foosball tables.  Staff were friendly.  Have been here a few times and will be back for more.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear E S, Thank you for your review and your patronage at BC Kitchen. We are happy you enjoyed the Sunday prime rib special and the mashed potatoes and veggie sides. We look forward to welcoming you back to BC Ktichen and Parq Vancouver soon. Kind Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations

reviews.review_text: REVISED: tried this place again after management reached out to me. It started out slow (again) but once I flagged down Albert & let him know who I was, it all changed. Honestly, I really like the food and it will not take much to improve the service. So, I will retract my original stance and give this place another chance. Below is my original review: Reso made for pre-hockey game. Seated at 5pm sharp and the experience degraded from there. Finally able to place a drink order by 5:33 because I flagged someone down. It didnt get better as we were ignored the whole time we were there. Even management didnt care - the guy couldnt even look me in the eye. I would rather eat at the arena than come here again. Food was good and vibe is good but the lack of service just makes that all disappear.

Really enjoyed a casual date night here. Although it was weird to walk through the casino to get to the restaurant, I really enjoyed that it wasnt too loud/overwhelming given the number of TVs on and showing sports. The Market East side of the menu had DELICIOUS Asian food, and it was great the get the variety along with the pub fare. I found all the food came out piping hot, and service was attentive but not overbearing. Will definitely be back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Alison, I would like to thank you for such a great and thoughtful review of BC Kitchen We really do appreciate any and all feedback to help us grow and improve. We look forward to hosting you again in the near future. Regards, Albert Leung Assistant General Manager | BC Kitchen

reviews.review_text: Tasty food, decent service, reasonable prices and lots of TVs for watching sports

Great Happy Hour deals but food last call is so early! Around 8:45pm. Friendly service but a bit slow they forgot our appetizer and brought to the table at the end. Food was good tough! Would come back for food + drinks (a little bit earlier) before hitting the casino!
We came here for Sunday$15 Prime Rib deal. Staffs were very friendly. It is the best $15 prim ribs in town.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Raysing, Thank you for your excellent review and your patronage at BC Kitchen. We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed the prime rib! We sincerely appreciate your support and hope to see you back soon! Best Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations Parq Vancouver

reviews.review_text: Right off the bat, hard to find. When we finally got there the atmosphere was nice, very clean and classy. Our service was alright, he was on top drinks but the timing on the kitchens part could have been faster. We got the dine out package (3 course meal). Surprise at how great the food was, will be back!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Sammy, Thank you for your review and your patronage at BC Kitchen. Its great to know that you enjoyed the food and sports memorabilia atmosphere! Please accept our sincerest apologies for the service delays. We will take your valuable feedback into consideration and work to improve. We look forward to welcoming you back soon! Best Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations

reviews.review_text: Visited for their Dine Out menu. Overall good. Appetizer (chicken pakora) was delicious, as was the dessert (toffee cake with ice cream)! The burger was nothing extraordinary. Service was great - Nathan was very kind and attentive.
Great food & service. Strong value for the price. Casual atmosphere for taking in sports in the casino. Volume of TV and music was rather loud.

Went for Dine Out Vancouver and enjoyed the $25 menu. Good options even with my allergies (GF and DF). Food was definitely worth the price, but huge TVs everywhere seemed counter to the food vibe. Also tough to find! You have to go through the casino.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Brieanna, Thank you for your review and your patronage at BC Kitchen. We are happy you had the opportunity to join us during the Dine Out Vancouver Festival, and that our options met your dietary needs. We look forward to welcoming you back to BC Kitchen and Parq Vancouver soon. Best Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations

reviews.review_text: Our dinner was great, we have ordered Prime Rib, Steak Frites, Fish & Chips, and enjoy our time there!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Alice, We truly thank you for dining with us tonight and we are overjoyed in hearing that you have a great time. We look forward to hosting you again in the near future. Regards, Albert Leung Assistant General Manager | BC Kitchen

reviews.review_text: Very big open space! I only go during opening as their happy hour is a great bargain. Definitely go for their special BC kitchen beers! Not too crazy on their domain though.
Convenient location and pit stop if youre making your way down to a hockey game
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Jennifer, Thank you for your review and your interest in BC Kitchen. We are happy you had the opportunity to stop by and that you found our location to be convenient. We look forward to welcoming you back soon! Best Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations

reviews.review_text: Great tasting chicken. a bit to less burn will be better.
Upscale pub vibes, pretty great ambiance, food was alright. A lot cleaner than most pubs!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Camille, Thank you so much for your fantastic review of BC Kitchen, we look forward to hosting you again in the near future. Regards, Albert Leung Assistant General Manager | BC Kitchen

reviews.review_text: Good place for a quick bite with a range of choices and reasonable prices. Lemon chicken salad is great!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Alexander! We are happy to know we hit the mark for you. Come visit us again soon! Kind Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations Parq Vancouver

reviews.review_text: Second visit to B.C. Kitchen. Having the Sunday prime rib special again. Great deal!
Great happy hour deals, excellent location when going to an event at BC place! Bar staff is great!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Ron, Thank you for your review and your patronage at BC Kitchen. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed the happy hour specials, service and proximity to BC Place. We look forward to welcoming you back to BC Kitchen and Parq Vancouver again soon. Warmest Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations Parq Vancouver

reviews.review_text: On of my go to places. Delicious food. Great atmosphere. Great happy hour.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Rhea, Thank you for taking the time to review your recent visit to BC Kitchen. We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed the food, the atmosphere and our happy hour! We hope to welcome you back to BC Kitchen in the near future. Kind Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations Parq Vancouver

reviews.review_text: Reserve your spot before arriving. Seats fill up fast.
Great atmosphere during sporting events
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your review and your interest in BC Kitchen, Danny! Glad to hear you had a great dining experience. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Best Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations

reviews.review_text: Food is good and service is fast.
Great short rib
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Nader, Thank you for your review and your patronage at BC Kitchen. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your dining experience and the short rib! We look forward to having you back at BC Kitchen and Parq Vancouver in the near future. Best Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations Parq Vancouver

reviews.review_text: Good food and service
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review and your patronage at BC Kitchen, Joel! We hope to welcome you back soon.

reviews.review_text: Correct. Nothing special. However, good service.
reviews.review_translated_text: Correct. Rien dexceptionnel. Par contre un bon service.

reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Joshua, Thank you for your rating and your interest in BC Kitchen. We look forward to seeing you back in the near future. Best Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations Parq Vancouver
Thank you for your rating and your patronage at BC Kitchen, John!
Dear Kirk, Thank you for your rating and your patronage at BC Kitchen. We hope to welcome you back again soon. Kind Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations Specialist Parq Vancouver

Dear Chua, Thank you for taking the time to rate your recent visit to BC Kitchen. We are happy you had the opportunity to stop by and dine with us. We look forward to welcoming you back to BC Kitchen and Parq Vancouver in the near future. Kind Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations Parq Vancouver
Dear Saurabh, Thank you for your rating and for choosing BC Kitchen! We are looking forward to seeing you back soon. Warmest Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations Parq Vancouver
Thank you for your rating and your patronage at BC Kitchen, Amelia!
Dear Karanvir, Thank you for your rating and your patronage at BC Kitchen. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon! Kind Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations Parq Vancouver
Dear Rob, Thank you for your rating and your patronage at BC Kitchen. We look forward to welcoming you back again in the near future. Kind Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations Parq Vancouver
Thank you for your rating, Rylan! We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Dear John, Thank you for your rating and your interest in BC Kitchen. Please reach us at bckitchen@parqvancouver.com if you would like to provide more information about your recent experience with us. We look forward to welcoming you back to BC Kitchen and Parq Vancouver soon. Sincerely, Emily Davis Community Relations Specialist Parq Vancouver

reviews.review_text: Nice pre concert spot. Service was v pleasant. Food was decent but not as good as an Earls or Cactus. Nice ambiance, basically a nice sports bar inside a casino. Would give it 3.5 if I could. Would return but not a destination place for me.

Food was incredible, and would be 5 stars for just that. But the service was terrible :( They kind of busy (as busy as any regular night would get), but the server would almost never come around, and they brought out 4/5 meals, 15 minutes before the last one was ready to be brought out
Great environment and very friendly staff. However I felt the food was less than average, the price is reasonable but I think you can go to a nearby restaurant to get better quality food.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Preetpal, Thank you for your review and your patronage at BC Kitchen. We are delighted to know that you enjoyed the ambiance and the service provided by our staff. I am sorry to hear that the food fell under your expectations. We will take your valuable feedback into consideration and share with the team. We hope to welcome you back to BC Kitchen and Parq Vancouver in the near future. Best Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations

reviews.review_text: A sports bar with a 90 minute table limit? Pick which quarters or periods you want to see I guess and then watch the remainder elsewhere.
Food was ok service was good.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Tony, Thank you for your review and your patronage at BC Kitchen. We are happy you enjoyed your dining experience. We would value any further input you may have that we can take into consideration to improve. Please feel free to reach us at info@parqvancouver.com if you would like to share more information. Thank you again. Best Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations

reviews.review_text: Nice tater tot poutine

reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Luna, Thank you for your rating and your patronage at BC Kitchen. We would value the opportunity to learn more about your recent experience and invite you to reach us at bckitchen@parqvancouver.com if you would like to share more information. We look forward to welcoming you back soon. Best Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations Parq Vancouver

Dear Marcel, Thank you for your rating and your patronage at BC Kitchen. We would value the opportunity to learn more about your recent experience. Please e-mail us at bckitchen@parqvancouver.com if you would like to share more information. We look forward to having you back at BC Kitchen and Parq Vancouver in the near future. Best Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations Parq Vancouver

reviews.review_text: Sports bar. They advertise as a great sports bar. Having games on screen with sound off while boots and cats club music plays the entire time. Easily worst sports bar Ive been to. Pizza we got was doughy from being undercooked. The food overall very disappointing The beers were good. That and the convenient location are the only reason its not 1 star. Will never go back.

There was a concert next door, so the restaurant was very busy, and seemed understaffed to handle the amount of patrons in for dinner or drinks. We placed our appetizer order, followed by the entree order a few minutes afterwards.  We then didnt see our server until after we were more than halfway done our entrees.  While the food was brought out quickly by the runners, no refills on drinks were offered at our table, while all other tables around us where receiving water refills constantly. We went because of the prime rib special being offered for Labour Day weekend, and although I ordered it medium rare, it came out medium well.  Also, minor complaint...on the menu it says the prime rib comes with au jus, but it seems like it was a red wine au jus, and tasted rather sweet.  With no salt/pepper set on the table, and no check-up from our server, I ended up eating the now sweet tasting over-cooked prime rib. We had great experiences at the restaurant previously, but this was enough to turn us away.  I dont think we will be returning.

Worst dining experience I ve had. There was no napkins or cutleries on our table. I had to asked for them after the foods came. The waitress brought 2 sets of fork and knife and 3 napkins while we were a table of FIVE. It was so hard to get their attention to bring extra cutleries so I didn t bother and just ate my calamari by hands. Others in my table had to wait for awhile to get more forks since they ordered prime rib. We also used our own napkins, luckily we carried some with us. The waitress also didn t want to hournor their prime rib special deal until we showed her deal on the Parq website. She walked away for a bit, came back with another person to confirm that the prime rib special doesn t come with a drink, then walked away again, came back and said she will make it works for us then brought a glass of wine to the person who showed her the website earlier. The other two in my table had to ask for their beers. Prime rib special isn t something new at BC kitchen and we had it many times before. The staff should know better.

I was attending a concert and thought I would try BC Kitchen. Big disappointment. I had the Prime Rib (house smoked Prime Rib served with crispy potatoe, mixed vegetables, au jus & yorkshire pudding) and a happy hour glass of wine.  The best part of the whole meal was the wine and au jus. The prime rib was adequate, the crispy potato was not crispy, the mixed vegetables consisted of 3 pieces of extremely hard broccoli and the Yorkshire pudding was disgusting. I ordered a second glass of wine so that I could swallow the food which took 15 minutes to arrive. By that time I had finished my disgusting dinner. Needless to say, I will not be returning anytime soon. Save your money and eat at McDonalds. After posting my review, the manager Albert) stopped by and we discussed my concerns with my meal and in the end made it right. He is going to talk to the kitchen and gave me a nice glass of wine. Thank you Albert for taking the time to address my concerns.

Service was slow with only 4 tables occupied. The food quality is not what I remember it to be from previous visits. The fries are crispy but hollow and oily. The batter on the fish was crispy outside and oily on the inside. The fish was bland and even oilier. Even the tartar sauce was bland. My drink - a 7up was watered down most likely from the bar well. Overall not what I was expecting.

Nachos were terrible. Expensive, dry, stale and barely any toppings.. we had to send them back. Vodka Red Bull was $22, bartender apparently made it a double ($15). The rest of the food wasnt as bad as the nachos. DO NOT recommend

Hadn t been or heard of this place, but came in specifically for the prime rib dinner family day special. Our waitress told us it would be a 40 minute wait because they just put a new one in, though it took much longer. One appetizer we ordered was the shrimp spring roll and it arrived completely grey/raw inside and only noticed after biting into it, she had it replaced and comp d. When our mains arrived, one of the sides was incorrect. I would not return and I do not recommend.
Was the food terribly bad? No. Was the food any good? No as well. Was service bad? No. .... Same goes for everything. Everything was just hm, ok, which is hardly acceptable for fine dining.
Waited a bit to be waited on st service window, waited for food awhile, sandwich was drenched & dripping with mayonnaise, which was not requested. Bun fell apart.
I waited for 5 mins and theres no one around. Additional star for looking nice! And Im sure the foods good if you can get in.... Ill try again some other time to change my review.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Patrick, Thank you for your review and your patronage at BC Kitchen. Please accept our sincerest apologies that there were no team members around when you arrived. We will relay this message to our team and work to ensure this doesnt happen in future. We would value the opportunity to welcome you back to BC Kitchen in the near future for an much improved experience. Thank you again. Best Regards, Emily Davis Community Relations

reviews.review_text: If you blindfolded me and had me taste my ceaser, I would have told you it was lemonade. It was incredibly citrusy, and at 18$ for a double? Pizza was OK but glad I paid the happy hour price. Sat with an empty glass for close to 45 minutes before someone checked on me and offered a refill. Will find lunch somewhere else next time I m at the parq. It was also very noisy with the TVs
The food was.. ok. The service was terribly slow. The chicken wings were obviously pre cooked a long time before we ate them. Also saw a mouse running across the restaurant (twice).
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Devin, My name is Albert Leung and I am the Assistant General Manager of BC Kitchen. Let me apologize for the less than enjoyable experience you and your tablemates had here. I would greatly appreciate a chance to further discuss your experience and take your feedback in to improve our service. I can be reached at aleung@parqvancouver.com. Regards, Albert Leung Assistant General Manager

reviews.review_text: The food was bland and the service wasn t amazing. Was expecting to end a night out with nice food but sadly that didn t happen. The churros were very hard and the fries and burgers were bland. The Caesar salad was good though.
